ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Prop" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Analyst" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Developer" ), (text( SBU__c ) = "D&S"||text(SBU__c) = "ATR"), RecordType.Name != 'M&PM SIM Licensing', RecordType.Name != 'ACS Labs', RecordType.Name != 'For_Loading', RecordType.Name != 'BGA AM', RecordType.Name != 'BGA AM Short Cycle', RecordType.Name != 'BGA Operator', RecordType.Name != 'BendixKing', OR( ISBLANK(text(PGo__c)), ISBLANK(text( PWin__c )) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: These required fields must be completed: PGo, PWin
